en.today: Strengthen your sense of community by surrounding yourself with people who are empowered and empower others, dear Aries. As the Sagittarius sun and Pluto align, you'll have a chance to transform your perspective and future opportunities by being mindful of who you spend time with. These vibes also encourage you to give strained dynamics a second chance, but only if you genuinely believe your counterpart is capable of growth and improvement. The Capricorn Moon sharpens your judgment, helping you exercise compassion without losing grip on reality. Pull back to visualize a better future when the nodes of fate stir this evening, making adjustments to your behaviors and routines that will support these aspirations.

en.today: Romantic developments bring enthusiasm to the heart, darling Leo, as a Sagittarius sun and Pluto align. If you've been hoping to take flirtations to the next level, now is a good time to do so. On a personal level, it's equally important that you cherish and admire yourself. Build confidence to ensure your connections may thrive. Meanwhile, the Capricorn Moon asks you to use your Sunday productively. Grab someone special to run errands with or keep you company while completing chores. Slow down and release stress to prepare for Monday's arrival while the nodes of fate stir this evening.

en.today: Life-changing opportunities could manifest, darling Taurus, thanks to a sweet connection between the Sagittarius sun and Pluto. Whether you find yourself discussing plans with a significant other or preparing to ask your boss for a raise, don't be afraid to take big swings that will help you get what you deserve. Just remember that you will need to follow through on any promises you make, being honest about what you bring to the table. Expand your horizons socially later this evening when the Capricorn Moon aligns with the nodes of fate, and lucky developments will ensue.

en.today: Allow family and friends to leave their mark on you, dear Gemini, as the Sagittarius sun and Pluto align. This cosmic exchange highlights the incredible power of love to transform our hearts and minds, inviting you to see the light within yourself and others. Give special attention to the people who bring joy to your life, going out of your way to return the favor. The Capricorn Moon brings stability to these relationships, enabling them to thrive in the long term. Set aside plenty of time to rest up this evening while the nodes of fate stir so that you can greet Monday with a hunger for success.
